_meta.source: Researched from Hawaii tourism, Kona visitor guides, and cruise lines

bbox_hint.note: Covers Kailua-Kona, coffee country, and snorkeling areas

transit_routes.name: Walk Historic Town
transit_routes.note: Tender drops at Kailua Pier. Historic town is walkable right from pier.

transit_routes.name: Snorkel Boat Tour
transit_routes.note: Best way to reach Kealakekua Bay. Many operators depart near pier. Book ahead.

featured_experiences.name: Historic Kailua-Kona
featured_experiences.note: Charming waterfront town. Shops, restaurants, history. All walkable from tender.

featured_experiences.name: Kona Coffee Tour
featured_experiences.note: World-famous Kona coffee region. Many farms welcome visitors. Ship excursions or taxi.

featured_experiences.name: Snorkeling Adventure
featured_experiences.note: Some of Hawaii's best snorkeling. Boat tour required for Kealakekua. Crystal clear water.
